name: Fairy Light
description:
Welcome to the world of Fairy Light, a classic 2D platformer developed by Mistake Game Studio!

You are Jerar Fernandes,a skilled magician who is serving his sentence.Once you have known about the loss of a person who is dear to you and escaped from prison to find him.

Immerse yourself in a dark world that is shrouded in mystery.Meet with obstacles face to face! Fight the master of the shadows of Jose,escape from the dungeon of the ancient city and from the Darkwood, overcome the dark charms in order to gain freedom and save the people who are dear to you!

Features
A well-developed world, consisting of several locations;
Different ways of passing levels;
A well-worked plot (has several endings);
Various combat mechanics;
Developed AI system (different opponents, each has its own class);
Unique sound-check (Migal Dmitriy);
And much more is waiting for you in Fairy Light!
